attributes.action: Bring to court those mp's who have claimed expences fraudulently
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
take action in the courts against those mp's who have claimed expences or other payments for their family or friends fraudulently.This activity if occured in every day business would almost certainly 
result in court action.failure to take action would sugest that mp's are above the law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
